name: Catch These Hands
description:
Catch these hands is a VR fighting experience caught between hilarious physics and cute, yet angry, bad guys. A game with a main focus on humor and engagement that pits you against hordes of hilarious challenges. Enemies and puzzles will give you challenge in the game as you progress through different levels and find new ways to defeat your foes. 

  • System Requirements

    • HTC Vive VR Headset ONLY

    • Tracked Motion Controllers

    • Play Area

    • Minimum

      • OS: Windows 10

      • CPU: Intel i5-4590k

      • RAM: 8GB RAM

      • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970

      • DX: Version 11

      • HDD: 1 GB available space

    • Recommended

      • OS: Windows 10

      • CPU: Intel i7-4770k or better

      • RAM: 16 GB RAM or more

      • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti or better

      • DX: Version 11

      • HDD: 1 GB Available Space

  • Installation Instructions

    • Download CatchTheseHands build zip

    • Extract the folders to a destination of your choice

    • Run the steam VR calibration software and follow the prompts

    • Run the CatchTheseHands.exe once your Vive system is calibrated and enjoy the game!
